column4: hi all can someone please PM me, i'm in the middle of setting up Ubuntu as a solo boot on my second machine and am having Issues with the partitions (i have a usic drive on the other PC that i wish to preserve) I would like some help and need someone a little patient with me as im a total noob with Ubuntu/linux/unix
